title: Executive Assistant - Marketing Agency (Remote, UK Hours)
job_overview:
We’re hiring a highly organised, growth-minded Executive Assistant to support the founder of a fast-growing marketing agency. You’ll start part-time (3–4 hours/day) and help manage internal admin, client onboarding, and daily operations.

This role is ideal for someone who’s proactive, detail-oriented, and looking for a long-term opportunity with real progression. You’ll work closely with the founder, learn our systems (GoHighLevel, Slack, Notion, etc.), and eventually take on calendar, inbox, and ops management.

Requirements:
- Excellent written and spoken English
- Must be available during UK hours
- Strong organisational and learning skills
- Comfortable with tools like Google Drive, Slack, Notion
- £5/hour to start, with regular reviews and growth
